synopsis.text: Children can embark on a culinary adventure with the animated series "Cookin' Idol Ai! Mai! Main!". The show stars the main character, Main, who guides young viewers through the process of preparing various dishes. The unique format of the show combines both animated and live-action segments. In the animated portion, Main demonstrates the cooking techniques, while the live-action segment features Main's voice actress, Haruka Fukuhara, attempting to replicate the same dish. The live-action segment is not included in the average episode duration of ten minutes. This innovative approach to teaching cooking aims to engage and educate children in a fun and interactive way.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
